title: SCTIMST Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Project Research Scientist Post
description: Sree Chitra Tirunal Institute for Medical Sciences and Technology (SCTIMST) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Research Scientist Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Post-Graduation can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here, we mentioned more about the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the SCTIMST Recruitment 2025 .
